Capture every signal with AI.Connect effortlessly.

Common Room provides the most comprehensive set of signals available anywhere—out of the box. Auto-collect and unify buying signals with AI across 50-plus channels spanning product, CRM, website, social, community, open source, and beyond.

More pipeline.Less effort.

See sales solutions

Surface actionable buying signals, uncover the person and account behind the signal, and automate personalized outreach at scale with our AI-powered copilot.

  • Use AI to automate pipe-generating sales plays from signals like pricing views, product usages, job changes, and hundreds more.
  • Put outbound on autopilot with workflows for end-to-end signal capture to action.
  • Accelerate speed to lead with real-time Slack alerts triggered by top account activity.

Read the story

"Before Common Room, our Vercel Development Representatives (SDRs) bounced between multiple tools and systems to identify signals and deliver that value-based experience. Now we capture every signal in one place and focus on building great outreach versus stitching together a story. Our team has signals like social engagement, job changes, and product sign-ups at their fingertips. All of this leads to more relevant conversations with our most receptive audience, and we've helped more customers as a result.”

  • Nicholas Gage

    Head of Sales Development,Vercel

“Common Room makes me a hell of a lot more efficient. I have a lot of AEs to support, and I need to deliver pipeline for them. Common Room is a big part of that. I can book meetings much more quickly.”

    Sales and Business Development Leader, EMEA,dbt Labs

Read the story

“Common Room unifies every touchpoint of developer adoption—from repo activity to product usage to engagement on user forums and social. It’s been an absolute game changer for how we run go-to-market.”

    SVP of Marketing,Docker
